title: FS: SGC Phillippe EPDG 45 & Krause Pitching 60 - $250 for the pair
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: SGC Phillippe EPDG 45 & Krause Pitching 60 - $250 for the pair
posts.post_content:
Bargain price for these two... offering them as a pair for the next six hours.

The Krause is unbelievable sharp.  I cannot find the flaw, but the card was submitted twice and came back with the same grade.  Phillippe isn't the toughest EPDG, but it is a stunner.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sgc-graded/10758/phillippe-deacon[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sgc-graded/10759/phillippe-deacon[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sgc-graded/7736/krause-pitching[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sgc-graded/7737/krause-pitching[/IMG]
